bibl.title: One Party or Two?: Simonides 22 West2.
bibl.note: I.E.G. II2, Simonides, 22. Produces a reconstruction of P. Oxy. LIX, 3965, fr. 27 and P. Oxy. XXII, 2327 (= Pack2 1750), frr. 2-4 based upon the propemptikon in Theocritus VII, 61-71. The poet, or whoever is speaking, is imagining a party (or parties) in the future, but not a journey for himself.
bibl.seg: HUNTER Richard, One Party or Two?: Simonides 22 West2.

I.E.G. II2, Simonides, 22. Produces a reconstruction of P. Oxy. LIX, 3965, fr. 27 and P. Oxy. XXII, 2327 (= Pack2 1750), frr. 2-4 based upon the propemptikon in Theocritus VII, 61-71. The poet, or whoever is speaking, is imagining a party (or parties) in the future, but not a journey for himself.
